PositionHistory.Title: Senior Consultant
PositionHistory.Description:
(working as Senior Consultant) since Nov' 2014 to Till date.
• Involved in Requirement gathering, preparation of Business Requirement Document, Functional specification document.
• Good exposure of conducting various types of testing like System, System Integration, Functional, Regression, Industry testing, Self Certification and UAT testing etc.
• Extensive knowledge in software development life cycle (SDLC), software testing life cycle (STLC) and Defect life cycle.
• Extensive knowledge in Payments (RTGS/CHAPS/FEDWIRE) Domestic, international payments with various SWIFT Interfaces (SAG, SAA, SAB, SNA, SNL), RMA set up.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 63% of this job

PositionHistory.Description:
Project: Image Clearing System (Digital Cheque Image Processing)
Client: Lloyds bank TSB (Retail & Digital Banking)

Description: The scope of this project is to implement robust, reliable and secure image based cheque clearing service in UK's cheque clearing process to replace the existing paper cheque clearing processing. The proposed new method will revolutionize the cheque clearing in the UK region which means cheque(s) will be processed using a digital image instead of existing paper-based clearing system where the actual paper cheque is transported around the country to be cleared within 2 days settlement cycle.

• Primarily analyse the solution(s) provided by the IT design team by going through the consolidated requirement catalogue consisting of business requirements, functional requirements by referring to Architecture document, MLPDs, DPADs, change requests.
• Responsible for Industry testing, Self-certification of cheque clearing process to ensure that the bank is compliant to UK bank regulatory.
• Accountable for all change request impact assessment (QA impact analysis) and prioritisation of the change requests for each release.
• Imparting the functional knowledge of cheque clearing process (both AS-IS & TO BE) models to guide the testing team for their test planning activities (Test scenario, Test cases).
• Guiding the testing team by clarifying the queries related to business, functional requirement and design solutions.
• Conducting the GAP analysis of the cheque processing functional aspects to ensure that the solution provided is testable.

Project: PEARL Galileo (High Value Payments processing platform migration)

JobCategory.Comments: QA and QC describes 26% of this job

sov:PositionHistoryUserArea.sov:NormalizedOrganizationName: Lloyds bank TSB Retail AND Digital Banking

PositionHistory.Description:
Project: Single Point of Entry (SPE)
Client: Citi Securities & Fund Services

Description: Single Point of Entry (SPE) is a strategic initiative to create a bidirectional hub that receives data files or messages from CITI clients and delivers these files or extracted individual messages to CITI's downstream systems. Main Business areas catered to by SPE are Custody (Settlement Instructions and Confirmations) and Fund Accounting Services provided by CITI. Other Business areas include Forex, Cash, Exchange Trade Data, Securities Lending, Derivatives, Corporate actions and Warrants Issuance.

Role & Responsibilities:
• Preparing the Business Requirements Document (BRD), Functional Requirements Document, MDD, MPD.
• Understanding the overall Business Analysis interfacing with SPE Product.
• Participating in Deal review process for the new client's On-Boarding process.
• Maintaining the SPE Documentation Pack (Deal Review, Product Capabilities etc).
• Updating SPE UI guide - every release on all enhancements done.
• Helping with Development team to fill in gaps in MDD, from a business/functionality standpoint.
• Training the Implementation Manager & Operational folks on new functionalities.
• Liaising with Vendor partner (GXS) on their new enhancements.

Project: XCEPTOR Integration
Client: Citi Securities & Fund Services

Description: Xceptor Data hub is a solution for organizations with large amounts of manual processing or input data in many different formats. It allows any business user to set up rules specifying how the data is to be handled. Xceptor Data hub then applies these rules automatically by capturing the data (any format) via any channel, enriches the data (verifying the data, cleansed, cross referencing calculations, exception handling will be applied), mapping the data (Data transferred to relevant format for your business multiple input formats can be transferred to one common internal format) and delivers it to the channel or report that is required.

Role & Responsibilities:
• Liaise with business (Citi Securities and Fund Services business owners, product sales, traders) to understand strategies and identify underlying business needs, and with development, to propose and design technology solutions, transform them into clear business and design requirements, and collaborate with development to realize successful implementation.
• Interfacing with business and other analysts, produce detailed use cases to guide the design and development of applications.
• Analyse data, processes, and usability input and produce clear and logical documentation of results.
• In addition to collaborating with professional designers, utilize design tools to create own sketches, mock ups and wire frames.
• Create effective presentations to be used with business audiences of various levels.
• Manage own timelines and milestones and partner with Project Managers in all project phases.
• Track, pursue, resolve and escalate issues for own projects while keeping interested parties and relevant stakeholders informed.
• Communicate continually with stakeholder's statuses of deliverables and flag potential risks and delays to successful completion.

Project: Fastrax

PositionHistory.Description:
Description: ACE application is part of WAVE-II program (which is migrating RBS Trade Platform) deals with End-To-End processing of Trade Finance transactions (Institutional, Corporate customers) which involves different types of transactions processing ( Letter of Credits, Import LC, Export LC etc.,).Migration includes migrating MIDANZ accounts to FINACLE Core Banking System implementing for TAIWAN region provideing automated solutions.

Roles & Responsibilities:

PositionHistory.Title: MQ queue Manager, Queue
PositionHistory.Description:
Bangalore, (Period June'07-April '10)

Project: MINT SWIFT Net Solutions (UK/CE/AP)
Client: Deutsche Bank, United Kingdom

Description: This is Middle ware for transforming/validate the message for sender and receiver bank .It provides the different types of connectivity for connecting host application like MQ, Dbus-MQ and other site it provides the RA connection for connecting the SWIFT Network. It is connected to multiple banking applications like Db-Trader, Espear, FXPCA, DB-Prizma, Money Market Wall street, Hotscan. It supports multiple message formats like FIN (MTXXX), FAX, and Telex etc.

Roles & Responsibilities
• Preparation of test Scenario document
• MQ queue Manager, Queue, Channel
• Planning and Execution of positive and negative test cases
• Writing Test cases with respect to the FSD
• Perform the End to End testing with the following interface protocol.
• Defect tracking
• Creating test cases for new features being added.
• Preparing Test Plan and functional specification document.
• Preparing the Test summary report.

Career Profile:

Company: Wipro Technologies Ltd, Bangalore (Period Nov 2014 - Till Date)


Project: Image Clearing System (Digital Cheque Image Processing)
Client: Lloyds bank TSB (Retail & Digital Banking)

Description: The scope of this project is to implement robust, reliable and secure image based cheque clearing service in UK's cheque clearing process to replace the existing paper cheque clearing processing. The proposed new method will revolutionize the cheque clearing in the UK region which means cheque(s) will be processed using a digital image instead of existing paper-based clearing system where the actual paper cheque is transported around the country to be cleared within 2 days settlement cycle.

• Primarily analyse the solution(s) provided by the IT design team by going through the consolidated requirement catalogue consisting of business requirements, functional requirements by referring to Architecture document, MLPDs, DPADs, change requests.

Project: PEARL Galileo (High Value Payments processing platform migration)
Client: Deutsche Bank

Description: The scope of this project is to define and implement the new strategic platform Galileo by replacing and decommissioning the payments modules / functions available in db-Internet, IDMS and dbCoral in the next years.  The scope of the project is not limited to the payments modules / functions (BACS, CHAPS, TARGET2 and SEPA) in these applications, and also on the replacement of other legacy applications and/or payments modules / functions such as MTNA DE and MTNA AMER. The project has been rolled out in a phased manner by implementing the project for Austria entity as the pilot country.

• Primarily walk through the business requirement, functional requirement documents by explaining the requirements to make the testers understand better for their test planning activities (Test scenario, Test cases).
• Guiding the testing team by setting up calls with Client partners, authors of the business & functional requirement document.
• Work closely with the testing team to impart the functional knowledge of payments processing (like various types of payment messages MT 103, 202, 202 COV, ISO 20022 XML; Cash management messages MT 940, 950).

Project: Fastrax
Client: FSTI-Canada.

Description: Fastrax is an accelerated SDLC model for small scale projects. When a work qualifies for the Fastrax path, a simplified Requirements document will be created, and a sparse Tech Spec. will be used for the design. The FastTrax process has been developed to provide a faster time to release of small-scale work that meets certain criteria, allowing our clients to achieve faster time to market when their requests meet the criteria.

Role & Responsibilities:

• Worked with business users and SME's to gather expectations of new system.
• Gathered business requirements from RFE (Request for Estimates) keeping in mind user's need for the application & documenting it for the developers.
• Prepared comprehensive business requirement documents using use case methodology that provided appropriate scope of work for technical team to develop the changes of Unitrax.
• Updated & communicated project status to management through effective Walk-through's.
• Prepared work flow modelling & documenting the end user's AS-IS work flow & TO-BE business processes.
• Interacted frequently with the project manager to evaluate the project status & the impact of the change request on the time line.
